column1: Aguada de Pasajeros (Spanish pronunciation: [aˈɣwaða ðe pasaˈʝeɾos]) is a municipality and town in the Cienfuegos Province of Cuba.
The municipality is divided into the town of Aguada and the villages of Carreño
column5: was part of it until the 1977 administrative reform.

column2: the municipality of Aguada de Pasajeros had a population of 31
column3: 687. With a total area of 680 km2 (260 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 46.6/km2 (121/sq mi).

column1: The town is served by the A1 motorway and counts a train station on a line linking Havana to Cienfuegos.
